title: Manage Intermodal Container Transfer
description: A container needs to be lifted from a train and mounted onto a truck chassis for final delivery.

tasks.description: A truck driver arrives at the terminal gate and provides the container number they are there to pick up.
tasks.expected_outcome: The gate system captures the container ID.

tasks.description: The system verifies the container has been unloaded from the train and is available for pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the container is ready.

tasks.description: The system assigns the driver a parking spot and dispatches a crane operator to lift the container onto the driver's chassis.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is sent to the crane operator.

tasks.description: Once the lift is complete, the system logs the container as 'out-gated' and on its way to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The container's status is updated, and the billing process is triggered.
